channel.title: The end of the world
channel.description:
now everyone hates spider jokeys right?
well i found something even worse [IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/rrksxg.png[/img] we are basicaly screwed now

item.title: The end of the world
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

[quote=“whattehp406, post:13, topic:389645”][quote author=drubrkletern link=topic=485553.msg3558874#msg3558874 date=1302106054]

[quote author=whattehp406 link=topic=485553.msg3558566#msg3558566 date=1302070602]

[quote author=krackkid link=topic=485553.msg3558147#msg3558147 date=1302045105]

Ffs I made this a long time ago, I also made a creeper mounted on a squid, mounted on a cow, pig, sheep, wolf. Not hard to do.

how?
[/quote]on a server with spawnmob you do /spawnmob MOUNT,npc 1

So like /spawnmob spider,creeper 1
[/quote]doesn’t work on sc

but you can with single player commands
download it and type /spawnstack mob1 mob2 mob3 mob4 mob5 …
i made a tower of 20 creepers and they walked into my mob grinder

also the 1st mob you enter is the lowest one
if you are a great height and don’t want them to die falling down use a chicken as first mob

Lawl i made b34st mobs:


[/quote]the creeper has a hat

and that’s a very strong spider you haz dere…[/quote]
ikr?

Read full topic
